bio:
Jingjing Wang is an Instructor of Chinese Language at NYU Shanghai. Prior to joining NYU Shanghai, she taught second level Chinese for Princeton University’s Beijing language program in 2012 and later taught intermediate Chinese at the International School of Beijing Film Academy in 2013. She holds a master’s degree from Beijing Normal University.

Research Interests

  • Chinese grammar
  • Song activities in Teaching Chinese as a Second Language

Courses Taught

  • Elementary Chinese II
  • Elementary Chinese II - FoS2
  • Intermediate Chinese II

Education

  • M.A., Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages, Beijing Normal University, 2014
  • B.A., Chinese Language and Literature, Shenyang Normal University, 2009

Languages

Chinese; English
